description.original: Print notes and documents directly from your workspace.
description.translation: Print notes and documents directly from your workspace.

dict.Notice(\"Default styling could not be lo: Notice("Default styling could not be located.")
Notice("Could not find the plugin path. No default print styles will be added.")
dict.Notice(\"No markdown files found in the: Notice("No markdown files found in the folder.")
dict..setDesc(\"Include the note title in the: .setDesc("Include the note title in the printout.")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the font size for the pri: .setDesc("Set the font size for the printed note.")
dict..setDesc(\"When printing a folder, combi: .setDesc("When printing a folder, combine all notes into a single document. If disabled, each note will start on a new page.")
dict..setDesc(\"Enable this option to interpr: .setDesc("Enable this option to interpret horizontal lines (---) as page breaks ")
dict..setDesc(\"Enable debug mode. This will: .setDesc("Enable debug mode. This will open the print window for inspection.")
dict..setDesc(\"You can add custom print styl: .setDesc("You can add custom print styles by adding a `print.css` snippet. The print window's body uses the `obsidian-print` class, so you can prefix your custom print styles accordingly.")
